name: Pongus
description:
Work in progress...

Classic Pong game  for two players with some new features.  The classic part is ready.

Features: advanced match settings

Features to come: more gamemodes, more skins for ball and rackets, more backgrounds, visual effects.

Controlls: w/s - 1-st player, arrow up/down - 2-nd player, esc - pause

Music by Danil Klyuyev
